interpretation:
The flag of Lebanon represents the country's unity, diversity, resilience, hope, and heritage. The red and white stripes symbolize the bloodshed and peace that the Lebanese people have experienced throughout history. The green cedar tree at the center represents immortality, growth, and strength. 

This card reminds us that we are stronger when we stand together, despite our differences. It encourages us to appreciate and embrace our cultural diversity, and to draw strength from our collective heritage. It also reminds us that we can overcome even the most challenging obstacles with resilience and hope. 

If you draw this card, it may indicate that you are being called to unite with others and work towards a common goal. It may also suggest that you need to draw on your inner strength and resilience to overcome a difficult situation. Finally, it may encourage you to explore your heritage and cultural roots to gain a deeper understanding of yourself and your place in the world.
